desc: Gave an invited talk at ACM-W, Manipal on Guide to Research Internships
Came Second Runners up in #ShowYourSkill(Coursera) where we participated in the Research & Reports Track and creating a NLP augmented Machine Learning Application for women safety.
Gave an invited talk at Research Society MIT on Paving your Research Journey - A guide for undergraduate students
Gave an invited talk at ACM-W, Manipal for the the Search for Research Event conducted to inspire and guide girls from all over India to pursue research
Received the Mitacs Globalink Research Internship(GRI) Award which is a 12-week paid internship program inviting students to undertake research projects at Canadian Universities
Received the Adobe India WIT 2022 Scholarship (one out of six girls selected all over India).
Completed the Microsoft Technology Associate Certification for Introduction to Programming using Python.
